Segment.name: LEQ
Segment.comment: To communicate necessary data for car hire settlements with leased equipment and identify billing parties and allowed dates

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Year
Field.comment: Four position designation of the year expressed as CCYY

Field.name: MonthOfTheYearCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the month of the year

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ExchangeRate
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier conversion factor to convert monetary value from one currency to another
